title: Enabling HTTPS Connections
text:
enabling https connections <p>this guide will walk through how generate your own selfsigned certificates use by chainlink node can also substitute with own like those created < href="https://letsencryptorg/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">let's encrypt</></p><rdmecallout theme="info" icon="ðŸ“˜" value=" need href=&#x22;https://wwwopensslorg/&#x22; target=&#x22;_blank&#x22; rel=&#x22;noreferrer noopener&#x22;>openssl</> order certificates"><p> href="https://wwwopensslorg/" noopener">openssl</> certificates</p></rdmecallout><p>create directory <code>tls/</code> within local directory:</p><codetabs><pre><code class="languagetext" meta="rinkeby" lang="text">mkdir ~/chainlinkrinkeby/tls</code></pre><pre><code meta="kovan" ~/chainlinkkovan/tls</code></pre><pre><code class="languageshell" meta="mainnet" lang="shell">mkdir ~/chainlink/tls</code></pre></codetabs><p>run this command create <code>servercrt</code> <code>serverkey</code> file previously lang="shell">openssl req x509 out ~/chainlinkrinkeby/tls/servercrt keyout ~/chainlinkrinkeby/tls/serverkey \ newkey rsa:2048 nodes sha256 days 365 subj '/cn=localhost' extensions ext config &#x3c;( printf "[dn]
cn=localhost
[req]
distinguished_name = dn
[ext]
subjectaltname=dns:localhost
keyusage=digitalsignature
extendedkeyusage=serverauth")</code></pre><pre><code ~/chainlinkkovan/tls/servercrt ~/chainlinkkovan/tls/serverkey ~/chainlink/tls/servercrt ~/chainlink/tls/serverkey dn
[ext]
subjectaltname=dns:localhost
keyusage=digitalsignature
extendedkeyusage=serverauth")</code></pre></codetabs><p>next add <code>tls_cert_path</code> <code>tls_key_path</code> environment variables <code>env</code> file</p><codetabs><pre><code lang="shell">echo "tls_cert_path=/chainlink/tls/servercrttls_key_path=/chainlink/tls/serverkey" >> env</code></pre></codetabs><p> <code>chainlink_tls_port=0</code> present file remove running:</p><codetabs><pre><code meta="shell" lang="shell">sed '/chainlink_tls_port=0/d' env</code></pre></codetabs><p>also line that disables <code>secure_cookies</code> '/secure_cookies=false/d' env</code></pre></codetabs><p>finally update run forward port 6689 container instead 6688:</p><codetabs><pre><code lang="shell">cd ~/chainlinkrinkeby &#x26;&#x26; docker p 6689:6689 v ~/chainlinkrinkeby:/chainlink envfile=env smartcontract/chainlink n</code></pre><pre><code ~/chainlinkkovan ~/chainlinkkovan:/chainlink ~/chainlink ~/chainlink:/chainlink n</code></pre></codetabs><p>now when running node access navigating href="https://localhost:6689" noopener">https://localhost:6689</> same machine ssh tunnel</p>
